title: [COMPLETE]Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.3 - 12/02/2015
body:
Summoners,

On 12/02/2015, starting at 03:30 AM AEDT, ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.3. At 05:00 AM AEDT, the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded.

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 6 hours.

This patch is approximately 442MB

Update:

The maintenance has been completed.

If you experience any bugs or issues be sure to post them in our Mega Thread for the team to investigate.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/GqEco4oe-patch-53-bugs-megathreada

-ToxicHawk
